title: Nikki Ferris shares a kiss with MAFS' Troy Delmege
text:
She was rejected by Matt Agnew on The Bachelor while he failed to find lasting love on Married At First Sight.

But on Friday, Bachelor reject Nikki Ferris and Married At First Sight's Troy Delmege showed no signs of heartbreak as they partied up a storm together.

The pair shared a passionate kiss shortly after arriving to Believe Advertising's 17th Birthday Bash at The Flamingo Lounge in Sydney.

Matt who? Bachelor reject Nikki Ferris shared a kiss with MAFS' Troy Delmege at Believe Advertising's 17th Birthday Bash in Sydney on Friday

Nikki showed off her quirky personality at the posed against the media wall with Troy before entering the event.

The 24-year-old leaned in for a kiss while wrapping her leg around Troy who placed his hand against her back.

Nikki definitely dressed to impress in a skin-tight red jumpsuit which showed off her ample cleavage.

Strike a pose! Nikki showed off her quirky personality as she posed alongside Troy shortly after arriving to the event

She completed her look with a pair of strappy black heels, several rings, earrings and dark nail polish.

The cheerleader wore her brunette hair down while opting to wear a bright make-up palette consisting of faux lashes and black eyeliner.

Meanwhile, Troy looked sharp in navy pants, a grey patterned shirt and a matching coloured suit jacket.

Cheeky: Nikki leaned in for a kiss while wrapping her leg around Troy who placed his hand against her back

He accessorised his ensemble with a pair of brown shoes and a black watch.

Also attending the event were a number of other reality television stars including Elly Miles, Monique Morley and Emma Roche.

Love Island's Eden Dally, who is expecting his first child with Cyrell Paule, was also spotted at the bash.
description: She was rejected by Matt Agnew on The Bachelor while he failed to find lasting love on Married At First Sight.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
